synopsis.native: Dans mes précédents films, j'ai tenté de présenter la Palestine comme un microcosme du monde. Mon nouveau film, It Must Be Heaven, tente de montrer le monde comme s'il était un microcosme de la Palestine.
synopsis.english: ES escapes from Palestine seeking an alternative homeland, only to find that Palestine is trailing behind him. The promise of a new life turns into a comedy of errors: however far he travels, from Paris to New York, something always reminds him of home. From award-winning director Elia Suleiman, a comic saga exploring identity, nationality and belonging, in which ES asks the fundamental question: where is the place we can truly call home?
